Articles.Content:
How much does a candy bar cost where you live? I can get a good 6 inch by 1 inch by 2 inch bar for about $1.25. 90 cents if I'm lucky.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T16:49:15Z" title="06/09/2015 04:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

> 
> How much does a candy bar cost where you live? I can get a good 6 inch by 1 inch by 2 inch bar for about $1.25. 90 cents if I'm lucky.

depends on where you go, but I can get a standard sized Snickers for about .75C to a buck. The long ones like Charleston Chews usually go for a buck+1/4 but I've seen them go for 1+3/4 to 2 bucks.
